title: BRIEF-Cymabay Announces 12-Week And 26-Week Results From Phase 2 Study Of Seladelpar In Patients With Primary Biliary Cholangitis
text:
Market News  52 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Cymabay Announces 12-Week And 26-Week Results From Phase 2 Study Of Seladelpar In Patients With Primary Biliary Cholangitis Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 11 (Reuters) - CymaBay Therapeutics Inc: 
* WEEK RESULTS FROM ITS ONGOING PHASE 2 STUDY OF SELADELPAR IN PATIENTS WITH PRIMARY BILIARY CHOLANGITIS AT THE INTERNATIONAL LIVER CONGRESSâ„¢ 2018 * SELADELPAR APPEARS SAFE AND WELL TOLERATED 
* RESULTS FROM PHASE 2 OF SELADELPAR STUDY REAFFIRM PLANS FOR ADVANCING TO PHASE 3 IN SECOND HALF OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
